subject: Re: testing for completion of a long-running, multi-level, legacy process
msgSnippet: ... Thanks to the several folks who suggested the timeout support in JUnit4 and TestNG. Unfortunately all our stuff is still JUnit 3.x, so I m gonna try to
messageBody:
Tom Roche 02/12/2007 02:57:09 PM:
> I'd like to automate [a] regression test [...] that starts the app
> and fails if the app does not complete in some defined time.

Thanks to the several folks who suggested the timeout support in
JUnit4 and TestNG. Unfortunately all our stuff is still JUnit 3.x, so
I'm gonna try to stick with that for now. Fortunately, there's
JUnitPerf.
